channel.title: Make a starter only work once!

item.title: Make a starter only work once!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

ry60003333:

Who started this ::starter thing? Just make the player start with the items you would get from ::starter, are people seriously that lazy?

I prefer that but I have no idea how =]

item.title: Make a starter only work once!
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

try this code

[code] }
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 150000000);
addItem(392, 15000);
sendMessage(“Get more food from the store owner:zeek”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Why do you have to be greedy?”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+ " is really greedy trying to type ::starter again");

}

}[/code]

edit the messages to what ever you want

Read full topic

item.title: Make a starter only work once!
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

How would I do this?

I added a code similar to this:

if (command.startsWith("starter"); } if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; sendMessage("MESSAGE HERE!"); sendMessage("Have fun!"); }

didn’t work! what now?

Read full topic
item.source: Make a starter only work once!
